title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled. They can be moved around, but they do not have any effect. This issue is especially noticeable when opening a small image, such as an icon, as the scrollbars are misleading and do not perform any action.
